name: A House for Alesa
summary: When Alesa was 6 years old, she had a terrifying encounter with a man called "Mr. Bob." She barely managed to escape from him and the experience has haunted her ever since...18 years later, Alesa, who became a social worker, has been sent to investigate a quite mysterious family living in a very unsettling house. What seemed like a simple task, might turn out to be the most horrifying day of her life...
